title: Waymo gets permission to charge fare and operate 24/7 in San Francisco
content:
Waymo One is Alphabet’s autonomous Lyft and Uber competitor that’s already operating in Phoenix, Arizona. Following testing in California, Waymo has now received permission to start charging fare and operate 24/7 in parts of San Francisco and San Mateo.

more…
